settings.label: Custom Store Name
settings.info: Enter a custom name for the store to display across your theme, or type 'USE_DEFAULT' to explicitly use the Shopify store name. Leaving this field blank will also default to the Shopify store name.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting]({{ site.url }}/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Header Menu Handles
settings.info: Enter the handles of the menus you want to display in the header, separated by a comma (e.g., 'main-menu,about-menu,contact-menu').

settings.label: Footer Menu Handles
settings.info: Enter the handles of the menus you want to display in the header, separated by a comma (e.g., 'footer, main-menu').
